title: How to Get Emolga in Pokémon Black and White

steps.title: Obtain a Boldore.
steps.content: Obtain a Boldore. It evolves from Roggenrola at level 25, or you can catch one at Chargestone Cave, Mistralton Cave, Twist Mountain, Challenger's Cave, Victory Road, or Giant Chasm.

steps.title: Go to Route 7.
steps.content: Go to Route 7. Route 7 is north of Mistralton City.

steps.title: Go inside the first house you find on the route.
steps.content: Go inside the first house you find on the route. There, you'll find a Hiker trainer asking for a Boldore in exchange for his Emolga. Agree to the trade, and he'll trade you his Emolga. It'll be level 30, nicknamed Minipete, and holding a Lum Berry.

steps.title: Go to Routes 5, 6, 7, 9, 10, 11, 12, 13, 14, 15, 16, Dragonspiral Tower, Village Bridge, Giant Chasm, Abundant Shrine, or Lostlorn Forest.
steps.content: Go to Routes 5, 6, 7, 9, 10, 11, 12, 13, 14, 15, 16, Dragonspiral Tower, Village Bridge, Giant Chasm, Abundant Shrine, or Lostlorn Forest.

steps.title: Run around until a part of the grass starts to shake.
steps.content: Run around until a part of the grass starts to shake. Go to this part of the grass, and you'll encounter a Pokémon. You'll know if you did this correctly by the different music playing for the encounter.

steps.title: While you're most likely to encounter Audino, you'll eventually encounter Emolga.
steps.content: While you're most likely to encounter Audino, you'll eventually encounter Emolga. Catch it and it's yours!
